about_the_game:
Welcome to the universe of the Omnicport Junction, a sprawling space station where civilizations meet and mysteries abound. You will act as a human from Earth, who lost part of memory and accompanied only by a quirky, talking cube. Together, using the extraordinary power of Mimic, you can absorb the ability and knowledge from other intelligent beings. Embark on a unknown journey, the goal is strive to unravel the secrets of your past and this station.

Ready for the epic encounters with intriguing civilizations

Prepare to immerse yourself in a cosmos teeming with life and diversity within the Omnicport Junction. Intelligent beings from distant galaxies converge here, shaping a net of alliances and conflicts. Every encounter unveils a world of personalities and experiences, ranging from unfriendly conflict to heartwarming camaraderie. Wait... what is the deal with that cat in the shadows?

Navigate a web of power and alliances 

In the pulse-pounding realm of the Omnicport Junction, power struggles are equally enduring themes. Mega-corporations from distant galaxies control aspects of the space station and attempt to annex each other. Will you be recognized as a thorn in their side, disrupting their machinations, or worship to the temptation of power and climb the hierarchy? The choice is on your hand.

Forge bonds and uncover secrets with potential friends

Beyond the confines of solitude, you can get to know new companions and forge alliances. These companions may be the key to unlock mysteries, overcome challenges, and even make romantic spark and entanglements despite of the cosmic chaos.

content_descriptors.notes: The depiction of adult content within this alternate world setting includes elements such as profanity, blood and injuries, crime, and other mature themes.

name: Whalefall Haven

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: i7-10700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7-12700
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 4060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Drogas ilícitas
Conteúdo sexual
Linguagem imprópria

short_description: Whalefall Haven is a narrative-driven space opera RPG set in the Omnicport Junction, where civilizations converge. Choose your unique build and use Mimic to explore the mysteries. Build relationships and make decisions impacting your reputation and your fate.
